profile.description: Inner heliosphere probe studying the solar corona and young solar wind
data_caveats: RTN frame rotates with spacecraft orbital position
analysis_patterns: Switchback detection: compute radial component sign changes in Br
Parker spiral angle: atan2(Bt, Br) compared to expected spiral
Perihelion passes: check distance and compare field magnitude

PSP_FLD_L2_MAG_RTN_1MIN.description: 1-minute averaged magnetic field in RTN coordinates

PSP_SWP_SPC_L3I.description: Solar wind proton moments (density, velocity, temperature)
